Game

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.app.Application
      • com.jme3.app.SimpleApplication
        • Game.Main
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.input.controls.ActionListener, com.jme3.input.controls.InputListener, com.jme3.system.SystemListener

    public class Main
extends com.jme3.app.SimpleApplication
implements com.jme3.input.controls.ActionListener
    The main client for the application, extending the JMonkeyEngine class SimpleApplication and providing functionality for starting and running the game.
    Version:
    %I%, %G%
    Author:
    Bob Thompson, Vasher Lor
